amendment.description: To establish a deadline for the Coast Guard to complete inspection of foreign ports and validate compliance with the International Ship and Port Facility Security Code, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4954 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4954 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S9567-9574) To establish a deadline for the Coast Guard to complete inspection of foreign ports and validate compliance with the International Ship and Port Facility Security Code, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4954 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4954 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Snowe.
